testcase.classname: Registration | user should be able to sign up with new account
testcase.name: user could sign up with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click on sign in Link..............................................passed When user enter his email with valid email format...........................passed And user click on create account............................................passed And user fills his personal data with valid data............................passed And user fills his address with valid data..................................passed Then user click on register button..........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | user could be able to log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user could log in with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to URL home page........................................passed And user click on signIn Link...............................................passed When user enter his email...................................................passed And user enter his password.................................................passed Then user clicks on sign in button..........................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: Checkout | user can checkout successfully Order
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to URL home page........................................passed And user click on signIn Link...............................................passed When user enter his email...................................................passed And user enter his password.................................................passed Then user clicks on sign in button..........................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed Given user hover to the Women category......................................passed And user click on the Blouses subCategory...................................passed Given user click on the resulted blouse.....................................passed And user add the selected blouse to the cart................................passed Then Blouse has been added successfully.....................................passed Given User click on proceed to checkout button..............................passed And User click on proceed to checkout button on the summary page............passed And User click on proceed to checkout button on the address page............passed And user agree to terms of service..........................................passed Then User click on proceed to checkout button on the shipping page..........passed And user select to pay by bank wire.........................................passed And User confirm his order in the payment page..............................passed Then Order Confirmation msg appear..........................................passed
